name: Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts (Collector´s Edition)
detailed_description: In the hidden object adventure "Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts", five explorers have disappeared while searching for evidence of ancient astronauts that came from other planets to earth thousands of years ago! Join the Unsolved Mystery Club in the hunt for the missing explorers and unlock ancient secrets of the past. Explore exotic locations around the world and uncover artifacts supporting the existence of visitors from other worlds"
about_the_game: In the hidden object adventure "Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts", five explorers have disappeared while searching for evidence of ancient astronauts that came from other planets to earth thousands of years ago! Join the Unsolved Mystery Club in the hunt for the missing explorers and unlock ancient secrets of the past. Explore exotic locations around the world and uncover artifacts supporting the existence of visitors from other worlds"
short_description: In the hidden object adventure "Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts", five explorers have disappeared while searching for evidence of ancient astronauts that came from other planets to earth thousands of years ago! Join the Unsolved Mystery Club in the hunt for the missing explorers and unlock ancient secrets of the past.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
